thread.title: Specialized Web and App Designer Offers Proven Search Engine Techniques
thread.title_full: Specialized Web and App Designer Offers Proven Search Engine Techniques

author: prbuzz.com
title: Specialized Web and App Designer Offers Proven Search Engine Techniques
text:
Action Taker Introduces SEO Page 1 Guarantee for Property Websites
September 7, 2015 – Action Taker, a leading web and app design business for the real estate industry, announced today that it is offering search engine optimization (SEO) services for property websites with a guarantee of reaching page one of search engines. The SEO service supplements Action Taker’s popular property website and mobile app development packages.
“We are very specialized, with a great deal of experience in property websites,” said Harry Evans, CEO of Action Taker. “We are able to leverage this experience for your advantage in SEO – getting you to page one of search results, which is where you need to be to get anywhere in the property business.”
Action Taker encourages its clients to embrace the kind of anywhere/anytime/any device reality of real estate web communication. “Real estate people are not just sitting behind desks,” Evans added. “Think about it. How much time do you spend driving around looking at properties? You need a way to connect to property owners over a mobile device.” The company satisfies this market need by offering clients the ability to build effective web sites and mobile apps for Android and iPhone devices at economical package rates.
Action Taker clients express appreciation for what the company has done for them, with one customer commenting, “Every once in a while you are lucky enough to meet a company who quite simply stand out way above the rest, in a world filled with skilled, experienced, successful outfits you can fully appreciate the sheer quality and commitment they have.” Another noted, “They are just outstanding at what they do and the support they give, we have now had them build a second site for another of our property companies.” Action Taker is now taking their proven quality of work into the realm of SEO.
For more information, visit http://actiontaker.co.uk
